channel.title: U kno those things u h8?
channel.description:
8 errors :( can someone help? [code]NPCHandler.java:799: illegal start of expression public static boolean IsDropping = false; ^ NPCHandler.java:800: illegal start of expression public void MonsterDropItem(int NPCID) ^ NPCHandler.java:1021: illegal start of expression public static int worldmap2[][] = { ^ NPCHandler.java:1030: illegal start of expression public int remove = 2; // 1 = removes equipment, 2 = doesn't remove - xerozcheez
^ NPCHandler.java:1031: illegal start of expression public static int removeschaos[] = {1,2,2,2}; ^ NPCHandler.java:1033: illegal start of expression public static int randomremoveschaos() ^ NPCHandler.java:1567: ';' expected } ^ NPCHandler.java:1567: '}' expected } ^ 8 errors[code]
:( plz help[/code][/code]
